itemDescription: Recipient of the Distinguished Flying Cross

wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Walter "Wally" Wallens  (1 February 1916 – 13 November 1995) was a British Royal Air Force officer, who flew during the Battle of Britain and as such is one of "The Few".

response: *Ronald Wallens (1916–1995), British Royal Air Force officer, who flew during the Battle of Britain and as such is one of "The Few"
